short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep focused only in the classes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to haver a bigger space to watch your classes in Platzi Platform. This extension will move some areas of the UI like a Theater Mode and this space will be keeped even when the classes playlist contnue to the next class and you can keep focused only in the video and the resources of the class. 

Also you can activate and deactivate this mode with a shortcut to see the comments section and do your own comments.
